question.body: Stiffening of the arteries due to degenerative changes is most specifically called __________.

response.feedback: Correct. Arteriosclerosis describes the process of the arteries loosing the elasticity as they age.
Incorrect. Atherosclerosis describes the process of plaque accumulating on the arterial walls.
Incorrect. Arthritis is an inflammation of the joints that can occur as a body ages.
Incorrect. Congestive heart failure is a decrease in the efficiency of the pumping abilities of the heart.
